ygData.subject: Re: question about meeting in august
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, I am on the East Coast, and all set up again! Wow, what a move.... As far as our meeting goes, here is a rough update.  So far, Friday and
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, I am on the East Coast, and all set up again! Wow, what a move....<groans>

As far as our meeting goes, here is a rough update. So far, Friday and
Wednesdays are bad days for us, and it's going to be the first week of August.
How about that first Thursday? Any one have a conflict with that?

I have made a character named Ishtarre, who will act as hostess only to the
point of getting everyone together. She will probably be 3rd or 4th at the
most. I will be getting her to Freeport, where she will start making bat
crunchies like there is no tomorrow. =) Make a new character, bring one if you
have one already so we can see who you like to be, whatever.

I'm really excited about this. I don't know anyone here yet except my family
and I won't be starting college until the fall, so......I'm lonely! hehe


Melissa Johnson wrote:

> From: "Melissa Johnson" <mnj_@...>
>
> are we all making newbie level 1s then or should we have a character up some
> in levels? Where can we all meet at? Almost any day is good for me except
> wednesdays
>
>
